member.name: M:Nine.Content.Pipeline.ContentProcessorContextExtensions.BuildAsset``2(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.Pipeline.ContentProcessorContext,``0,System.String)
member.summary: Initiates a nested build of the input object.

member.name: M:Nine.Content.Pipeline.ContentProcessorContextExtensions.BuildAsset``2(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.Pipeline.ContentProcessorContext,``0,System.String,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.Pipeline.OpaqueDataDictionary,System.String)
member.summary: Initiates a nested build of the input object.
member.remarks: The input object will be serialized in to an Xml asset file using IntermediateSerializer. Then that file is imported and processed though the content pipeline. If an asset name is specified, the processed object will use that asset name as the output. Otherwise, an MD5 hash string of the input object will be calculated as the asset name, and the asset will be written to the "Misc" folder of the output directory. All content references and external references are automatically relocated to match the new output directory.

member.remarks: The input object will be serialized in to an Xml asset file using IntermediateSerializer. Then that file is imported and processed though the content pipeline. Otherwise, an MD5 hash string of the input object will be calculated as the asset name, and the asset will be written to the "Misc" folder of the output directory.
